lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Mardy Fish was upset by the Pakistani qualifier Aisam ul-Haq Qureshi, 6-3, 6-4, in the first round of the Hall of Fame Championships yesterday in Newport, R.I. Qureshi broke Fish in the eighth game of the first set. The 214th-ranked Qureshi broke again in the second set for a 3-2 lead, lost his serve in the seventh game but broke back for a 5-3 lead.
